propDescriptions.children: The content of the component, normally an <img>.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.cols: Width of the item in number of grid columns.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.rows: Height of the item in number of grid rows.

img.nodeName: an `img` element to ensure it covers the item
